parameter.name: minThreads
parameter.description: Minimum threads waiting to service requests.

parameter.name: maxThreads
parameter.description: Maximum threads that will service requests.

parameter.name: threadMaxIdleTimeMs
parameter.description: Minimum threads waiting to service requests.

parameter.name: lowResourcesMaxIdleTimeMs
parameter.description: Time for an idle thread to wait for a request or read.

parameter.name: acceptorThreads
parameter.description: Number of acceptor threads to set.

parameter.name: requestHeaderSize
parameter.description: Size of the buffer to be used for request headers.

parameter.name: responseHeaderSize
parameter.description: Size of the buffer to be used for response headers.

parameter.name: requestBufferSize
parameter.description: Size of the content buffer for receiving requests.

parameter.name: responseBufferSize
parameter.description: Size of the content buffer for sending responses.

parameter.name: ioMaxIdleTimeMs
parameter.description: Maximum time to wait on an idle IO operation.

parameter.name: gracefulShutdown
parameter.description: The time (in ms) to wait for existing requests to complete before fully stopping the server.
